original_text: Shallum son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his fellow gatekeepers from his family (the Korahites) were responsible for guarding the thresholds of the tent just as their ancestors had been responsible for guarding the entrance to the dwelling of the Lord.
korean_text: 고라의 증손 에비아삽의 손자 고레의 아들 살룸과 그의 종족 형제 곧 고라의 자손이 수종 드는 일을 맡아 성막 문들을 지켰으니 그들의 조상들도 여호와의 진영을 맡고 출입문을 지켰으며

sentences.original_text: and his fellow gatekeepers from his family
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 가족 출신 동료 문지기들과 함께

sentences.original_text: were responsible for guarding the thresholds of the tent
just as their ancestors had been responsible
for guarding the entrance to the dwelling of the Lord
